briefTitle: Hypofractionated Loco-regional Adjuvant Radiation Therapy of Breast Cancer Combined With a Simultaneous Integrated Boost
officialTitle: The Skagen Trial 1, Moderately Hypofractionated Loco-regional Adjuvant Radiation Therapy of Early Breast Cancer Combined With a Simultaneous Integrated Boost: a Randomised Clinically Controlled Trial
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

Operated for early node-positive breast cancer with indication for loco-regional breast radiotherapy

Exclusion Criteria:

Previous radiotherapy to chest wall, pregnant/lactating, comorbidity which may hinder 10 years follow up
